pull.title: depends: capnp 1.3.0
pull.body:
Update capnp in depends to `1.3.0`.

Changes: https://github.com/capnproto/capnproto/compare/release-1.2.0...release-1.3.0.

ACK 719158db5cd5f14af896c677ec009dfd5a64a008

Although 1.3.0 removes the need for both linter exceptions in `src/ipc/.clang-tidy.in`, we don't use depends for the native tidy job, so we need to keep them for the time being.
